page.title: 01Droxford,Meon,A32,Hampshire
page.content: Mainly agricultural chalk downland. Parish boundaries fit roughly squares {Droxford}3West.Meonstoke 2North Centre and 3East.Soberton 2Centre and 2centre south.Only bits of the other villages. These pages concentrate on{Droxford. A conservation area since 1967.Pop. about 700 ,who love the peaceful countryside around.Retains 5 shops and many organizations.Car owners are not far from anywhere bus travel needs ingenuity,survival depends on the A32, thoughtless driving makes it a worry Some would like mains gas & drainage, more parking space,all electrictity underground.Trees fall in storms bringing cables down.Older residents are sad that their children cannot afford high house prices.Average family house Â£60k.There's a new 'phone exchange,and a call box;3 pubs,1 motel and a tea shop.River Meon runs N to S.
